title: Exercise: Create an FME Server App

questions.question: If Require Authentication is enabled when creating a Server App, the user must log in to FME Server before accessing the app.
FME Server Apps have a Run Immediately option. What does enabling this option do?
options: Runs the workspace immediately when the link is clicked.
Runs the workspace immediately after link is clicked and user selects OK.
Runs the workspace immediately after the FME Server App is initially configured.
Runs the workspace after the parameters of the workspace have been configured.
